import sys
def rs(): return sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()
def ri(): return int(rs())
def rs_(): return [_ for _ in rs().split()]
def ri_(): return [int(_) for _ in rs().split()]

N, X, T = ri_()
print(-(-N // X) * T)

import math

def takoyaki():
    # 入力
    N, X, T = map(int, input().split())
    # 処理
    count = math.ceil(N / X)
    return count * T

result = takoyaki()
print(result)
